sentence.Network_en: He received a flood of letters from irate constituents.
sentence.Network_cn: 他收到愤怒的选区居民洪水般涌来的信件。

sentence.Network_en: Her irate husband was hunting him with a gun.
sentence.Network_cn: 她暴怒的丈夫正拿着一把枪追杀他。

2. 航空监视雷达a irator 吸气器；抽风机；吸尘机自动发送接收机
He dragged the irate fellow to the door ., 他把那个发怒的家伙拖到门口.
Had to deal with an irate customer ., 不得不与一位愤怒的顾客打交道.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Latin iratus, from ira 'anger'

entry.tran: 发怒的;极其愤怒的;被惹火的
entry.def: If someone is irate, they are very angry about something.

example.ex: The owner was so irate he almost threw me out of the place...
example.tran: 店主非常恼火,差点把我从那个地方扔出去。

example.ex: She then wrote an extremely irate letter to the New Statesman about me.
example.tran: 她接着给《新政治家》杂志写了一封关于我的信，言辞极其激烈。

auth_sentence.content: Watson's earliest articles were brief, irate, and punctuation-deprived.
auth_sentence.res_content: Watson's earliest articles were brief, irate, and punctuation-deprived.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Watson's earliest articles were brief, irate, and punctuation-deprived.

auth_sentence.content: One particularly irate jaywalker went so far as to gob...on his windscreen.
auth_sentence.res_content: One particularly irate jaywalker went so far as to gob...on his windscreen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One particularly irate jaywalker went so far as to gob...on his windscreen.

auth_sentence.content: Irate beekeepers said that they couldn't restrict their bees' movement.
auth_sentence.res_content: Irate beekeepers said that they couldn't restrict their bees' movement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Irate beekeepers said that they couldn't restrict their bees' movement.

sentences.en: The irate animal made for us,coming at a full jump.
sentences.cn: 那头发怒的动物以最快的速度向我们冲过来。

sentences.en: We have received some irate phone calls from customers.
sentences.cn: 我们接到顾客打来的一些愤怒的电话。

sentences.en: A good telephone voice can do much to improve the temper of irate callers.
sentences.cn: 电话中悦耳的声音可以大大消减通话人的怒气。
